vampire.config_products.GlobalForecastSystemDatasetImpl module¶

class vampire.config_products.GlobalForecastSystemDatasetImpl.GlobalForecastSystemDatasetImpl(interval, product_date, vampire_defaults, region=None)[source]¶

Bases: vampire.config_products.RasterDatasetImpl.RasterDatasetImpl

Initialise GlobalForecastSystemDatasetImpl object.

Implementation class for GlobalForecastSystemDataset. Initialise object parameters and calculate start and end dates for dataset using product_date and interval.

interval : string
Data interval to retrieve/manage. Can be daily, pentad, dekad, monthly or seasonal
product_date : datetime
Data acquisition date. For pentad/dekad data, the data is actually for the period immediately preceding the product_date. For monthly data, the data covers the month given in the product date. For seasonal data, the product_date refers to the start of the season (3 month period).
generate_config(data_dir=None, variable=None, level=None, forecast_hr=None, download=True, crop=True, crop_dir=None, accumulate_days=None)[source]¶
